participant_1.background:
I like to be alone, but I love my baby.
I love watching Silicon Valley and making videos for my YouTube channel.
i have never been to the west coast of the united states.
I watch Game of Thrones even though my parents don't approve of it.
I'm not sure, but I can hear the difference between a C and a G.

participant_2.background:
I took my family camping and let my dogs run around.
I remember the smell of my mom's cooking and the sound of my dad's laughter.
I loved spending time with my grandparents, learning about their lives and hearing their stories.
i like to listen to country music.
sometimes i listen to gary numan to be ironic.

content.text: Hey! What are you up to?
Hi there, I'm just watching some TV.  What are you up to?
I'm just watching some videos on YouTube.  I love making videos for my channel.
That's so cool!  What kind of videos do you make?
I make mostly gaming videos.  I also make some videos about my life and my family.
That sounds really interesting!  Do you have a lot of subscribers?
I have a few thousand subscribers, but I'm still growing.  I'm hoping to get to 100,000 subscribers someday.
That's awesome!  I'm sure you'll get there if you keep up the good work.  I love watching YouTube videos, so I'll definitely be checking out your channel.
Thanks so much!  I'm glad to hear that.
What's your favorite thing about making YouTube videos?
I love being able to share my love of gaming with others.  I also love the creative aspect of it.  I get to come up with ideas for videos and then make them happen.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I've always thought about making YouTube videos, but I've never been able to come up with a good idea.
It's definitely not easy to come up with ideas, but it's worth it when you see your videos being watched by other people.
I can imagine!  I'm really impressed by the amount of work you must put into your videos.
It's a lot of work, but it's worth it.  I love making YouTube videos and I'm glad I can share them with others.
I'm sure your subscribers appreciate it too!  I know I would if I were subscribed to your channel.
Thanks so much!  I'm glad to hear that.
So, what's your favorite video that you've made?
That's a tough question!  I think my favorite video is the one where I play through the new Call of Duty.
That sounds like a fun video!  I love watching people play video games.
I'm glad to hear that!  I have a lot of fun playing video games, and I love sharing that experience with others.
I can imagine!  Video games are so much fun.
They are!  I'm glad you agree.
So, what other hobbies do you have?
I love spending time with my family and friends.  I also love going camping and hiking.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I love camping and hiking too.
I'm glad to hear that!  We should go camping sometime.
I'd love that!
